{{DISPLAYTITLE:Pound 2016: ''Melee'' Doubles Pools}}{{Pound 2016 Tabs|This=4}}
==Format==
The Doubles Pools are 16-team Double Elimination Bracket Pools. Two teams advance to the [[Pound 2016/Doubles Bracket|Top 16 Doubles Bracket]]; one from the Winners Bracket, and one from the Losers bracket.
